name: VÖLUSPÁ: Twilight of the Gods
description:
Ragnarök has started ! The last battle of the norse gods ! The giant wolf Fenrir has already killed Odin and stolen his spear. Only three surviving gods remain to prevent the world from ending : the fierceful Vidarr, god of Vengeance, Freyja, goddess of War, and Idunn, goddess of Eternal Youth. Each one of them can offer a different power to the whole group.

VÖLUSPÁ : Twilight of the Gods is an Action-Puzzle game.

  • Activate Vidarr's Vengeance and recreate the original picture to reflect part of your enemy's damage.
  • Activate Freyja's Shield-Maiden and repeat the full incantation in order to prevent part of your enemy's damage.
  • Activate Idunn's Rejuvenation and link the roots of Yggdrasil back together to heal a good amount of your missing health.

But beware ! Fenrir fury is unstoppable and he will attack Every 10 Seconds. Some of his onslaughts can do more damage than others. Fortunately the gods' powers are still strong, and they can foresee his next moves.

Play wisely and complete the challenges as fast as possible to unfold even more potent skills.
